backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 300 Bloor Street West

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1635-2019 to designate 300 Bloor Street West (University-Rosedale, Ward 11) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 1635-2019 - To designate the property at 300 Bloor Street West as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
